sememe.define: [material|材料,#tree|树,?building|建筑物,?furniture|家具,$burn|焚烧,$lighting|点燃]
[$create|创造,^$GiveBirth|生育!quality|质量,!price|价格,#material|材料,#instrument|工具,#commercial|商]
[!taste|味道,#livestock|牲畜,#fish|鱼,#bird|禽,#vegetable|蔬菜,#fruit|水果,$consume|摄取,*feed|喂]
[space|空间,#route|路,$TakeVehicle|搭乘,$drive|驾驭,*transport|运送,*AlterLocation|变空间位置]
[#military|军,#police|警,#country|国,*attack|攻打,*fight|争斗,*resist|反抗,*defend|防守,*kill|杀害,*destroy|消灭]
[#knowledge|知识,#recognition|感知状态,!content|内容,#AlterKnowledge|变感知,abstract|抽象]
[#human|人,*ExistAppear|存现,*perish|灭亡,$establish|建立,*ActGeneral|泛动,*AlterGeneral|泛变,^*SelfMove|自移,^*metabolize|代谢,space|空间]
